verses.content: Chun, Tura lal Hiram chun Solomon kuoma chun a siehlaw- hai a tir a, a pa aia lal dingin hriek an nâl ti a lo hriet sih a; Hiram chu David ngainatu a ni rawp hlak hrim a.
Chun, Solomon chun Hiram kuoma chun,
“Ka pa David khan LALPAIN a hmêlmahai a ke hnuoia a sie hmakhat khan chu a vêl kil tin kil tanga indonahai lei khan, LALPA a Pathien hming dingin in a bâwl thei nawh ti i hriet a.
Tu ruok hin chu LALPA ka Pathien chun kil tinah muongna a mîn neitir tah a, hmêlmahai khawm an um ta naw bawk a.
Chun, LALPA chun ka pa David kuoma, ‘I naupa i aia i lalṭhungpha kân hluotir ding chun ka hming dingin in chu la bâwl a tih,’ tia a lo hril ta ang khan, LALPA ka Pathien hming dinga in bâwl ka tum a.

Chuongchun, Lebanon tlânga mi sidar thinghai mi phûrpêk dingin thu pe la, ka siehlawhai khawm i sie- hlawhai lai hung ṭhang vêng an ta; chun, i siehlawhai hlaw ding chu i hril ang taphawtin pe pei ka ti che; Zidon mihai anga thing phûr thiem keini lai tukhawm an um nawh ti i hriet sih a,” tiin mi a tir a.
Chun, Hiramin Solomon thu a lo hriet chun a lâwm ta êm êm el a, “Hieng mi tamtak chunga rorêl dinga naupa vartak David kuoma petu LALPA chu vawisûn hin inpâkin um raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Hiram chun Solomon kuomah, “I thu mi hung incha chu ka lo hriet a, sidar thing thu le fâr thing chu i mamaw ang peiin lo thâwng ka tih.

Ka siehlawhaiin Lebanon tlânga inthawkin tuisuoriet chenin hung la thlâng an ta; chun, i hmun mi ruotpêk dinga tuisuorieta tawl dingin intêltir ka ta; chun, chu hmuna chun insuttir ka ta, nangin lo lâng i ta; chun, nang khawma ka sûngkuohai fâk ding tumin ka mamaw chu i lo phuhrûk ve thung ding annâwm,” tiin mi a tir a.
Chuongchun, Hiram chun sidar thing le fâr thing chu Solomon chu a mamaw ang ang chun a pêk a.
Chun, Solomon chun Hiram chu a sûngkuohai fâk dingin bu tekhâwng sîng hni le hriek sâwr tekhâwng sâwmhni a pêk a, chu chu Solomonin kum tina Hiram a pêk ang dân chu a nih.
Chun, LALPAIN a tiem ang ngeiin Solomon chu varna a pêk a, chun, Hiram le Solomon inkâra chun inremna a um a, an pahni chun thu an thlung ve ve tah a.
Chun, lal Solomon chun Israel mihai po po laia chun mi sinthawa ruoi lui pâwl a siem a; ruoi lui pâwl chu mi sîng thum an nih.
Lebanona chun thla khata in- thlâk peiin sîng khat a tir hlak a, thla khat Lebanona chun an hang um a, thla hni chu anni in tieng, Adoniram chu sinthawa ruoi luihai hotu a nih.
Chun, Solomon chun thil phur mi sîng sari le, lung sut mi sîng riet tlânghaia chun a nei a;
Chuonghai chu tiem loin Solomon chun a sin chunga hotubîk, sinthaw vêngtu sâng thum le za thum a nei bawk a.
Chun, lal thupêk angin lung- phûm chu lung sutsaa rem dingin lung lientak tak el, lung man tamtak takhai an hung lâk a.
Chun, in bâwltuhai Solomon mihai le Hiram mihai le Gebal mihai chun lunghai chu an sut a, in bâwlna ding chun thing le lunghai chu an buotsai a.
